title: Galloping Minds - Alphabet and Phonics Flash Cards
features: The Alphabet and Phonics Flash cards from Galloping Minds
are beautiful and are a great tool for introducing your child to letters and words. Robust to minimize the toddler chew-effect.

Alphabet Flashcards - these have uppercase and lowercase letters, exquisite photography. Every letter has a few words associated with it. Recommended use: Read the words on the cards aloud and then point at the letter and have your child repeat after you. They will love the colors and beautiful images and spend a good amount of time just looking at the cards.

Phonics flashcards - have about 36 blends which include consonant and vowel digraphs, initial consonant blends and final consonant blends. Each blend is associated with a beautiful image and a few words. On an average every blend has about 3 words associated with it. It's a great tool for building your child's vocabulary.
The set has over 200 words to help your child build his or her language skills.
description: The Alphabet and Phonics Flash cards are postcard size. Well designed and a great tool for introducing your child to letters and words. Alphabet Flashcards have uppercase and lowercase letters and excellent photography. Every letter has a few words associated with it. Phonics flashcards have about 36 blends, which include consonant and vowel digraphs, initial consonant blends, and final consonant blends. Each blend is associated with a beautiful image and a few words. On average, every blend has about 3 words associated with it. It s a great tool for building your child s vocabulary. Read the words on the cards aloud and then point at the letter and have your child repeat after you. They will love the colors and beautiful images and spend a good amount of time just looking at the cards. These cards, designed for parents and children, cover the entire alphabet, both upper and lower case letters, and to top things off, each letter comes with multiple words to reinforce the sound being memorized.All the cards also come with pictures to quench the children s curiosity. There are more cards to help your child learn different consonants (with different positions) as well as digraphs (for the vowels and consonants). These also come with entertaining images. The cards are HUGE, making them hard to lose, and all the images are child-friendly. With over 200 words to help learning, the sets are a great value. --Dr. Toys 10 Best Educational Products, 100 Best Childrens ProductsThese huge, sturdy and colorful flash cards are printed on glossy paper. The alphabet flashcards have both capital and lowercase letters and feature a few words. The set covers more than 200 words.
The children who played with these thought they were pretty and fun to play with themselves, in addition to learning from with an adult.
These are a very high-quality set of flash cards not the kind a toddler can easily destroy. The most special thing about them is undoubtedly the thickness and quality of the paper. --Toy Directory
